newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Corporate Acquisition News Briefs.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Corporate Acquisition News Briefs.

text.p: The following U.S. corporate acquisition news items were received by Reuters on Wednesday.
Micro-Integration Corp said it completed its acquisition of Computer One of Ohio on November 22.
The company said it purchased Computer One for $217,000, paid for in shares of Micro-Integration common stock. -----------------------------------------------------------
ROCHESTER, N.H., Dec 4 (Reuter) - Cabletron Systems Inc said it had agreed to acquire OASys Group Inc in an effort to broaden its role in the telecommunications market.
Under terms of the agreement, 240,000 shares of post-split Cabletron common will be exchanged for all outstanding shares of OASys.
Cabletron said the transaction is not expected to have a dilutive effect on earnings.
